title: Download OO chart package (AKS)
content:
You need to download the zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads website to the bastion node that you created during the SMA installation.

The Helm chart versions are indicated using the x.x notation. Replace it with the version relevant to your deployment. For example, if your deployment needs version 25.2.0 Helm chart package, replace oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip with oo-helm-charts-1.7.0+25.2.0.zip. 

Follow these steps:

  1. Download the .zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads website.
  2. Create a temporary directory and copy the file to it on the bastion node.
    For example: 
    mkdir -p /home/centos/oo_chart
scp -i <path_to_bastion>/ssh_key <path_to>/oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip user@<bastion_ip>:/home/centos/oo_chart/oo-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip
  3. Unzip the package:
    For example: 
    ssh -i <path_to_bastion_ssh_key> user@<baston_tp>
unzip /home/centos/oo_chart/oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip -d /home/centos/oo_chart/

The following table describes the essential files inside the OO chart package:

Name

File

OO Helm chart file

oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/oo-1.x.x+26.x.x.tgz
Example persistent volume and persistent volume claims yaml files

Persistent volume templates:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/samples/persistent_storage/aks/volumes.yaml

Persistent volume claims templates:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/samples/persistent_storage/aks/claims.yaml

Persistent volume Readme file:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/samples/persistent_storage/aks/README
